Package pong.logic

Class Summary
AI The AI class providing the bot's AI
Area Area class representing the game area's bounds
Ball The Ball class for representing the pong ball
BoundingBox Bounding box for entity collisions
Entity The entity base class all game entities are derived from
Game The Game class representing a single Pong game instance
Paddle The Paddle class representing the paddle
PlayerScore The PlayerScore class for storing the player score
